parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return.

parameter.name: excludeFields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude.

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: The number of records to return.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: The number of records from a collection to skip.

parameter.name: beforeSendTime
parameter.description: The campaigns sent before the set time in ISO 8601 time format.

parameter.name: sinceSendTime
parameter.description: The campaigns sent after the set time in ISO 8601 time format.
